name: Tunesly
author: Bob Thordarson

sections.description:
Introduction
Tunesly is a free iTunes affiliate link posting and sidebar widget plugin. Tunesly will automatically generate and display iTunes content using your LinkShare affiliate link ID inside posts relating to keywords in your post title or sidebar widget. If you are a LinkShare iTunes affiliate, you can earn up to 5% of every sale.

For more information, visit us at http://www.tuneslyhq.com
Tunesly Feedback and Support Forum:http://tunesly.uservoice.com/

Promote All iTunes Content Categories
Generate links across all iTunes available content categories:

The iOS Appstore | The Mac Appstore | iTunes Music | iTunes Video | iTunes Music Videos | iTunes TV Shows | iTunes Podcasts | iBookstore

Support for Linkshare Affiliates
Insert your Linkshare Affiliate ID and earn up to 5% per sale. If you are not an iTunes Affiliate sign up for free at the LinkShare Affiliate Program page and start making money with your WordPress blog!

In Post Links
Quickly generate iTunes links inside your blog posts. Links are generated based upon the post title as well as keywords added to the post wizard. Set your own link parameters by listing the number of columns and rows of links you would like to display. Or, insert one specific link at a time to content you would like to promote.

Sidebar Widget Links
The Tunesly sidebar widget allows you to post the top rated content in each product category. Content is automatically refreshed upon every page load to display the most current top rated Free or Paid content available from iTunes.

Social Sharing
Quick social sharing is built directly into each link. Your readers can quickly share iTunes links inside Facebook and Twitter. All shared links contain your Linkshare affiliate code so you’ll earn income across social networks.

Geolocation Delivers the Right Links in the Right Country
Geolocation ensures that only relevant geographic links are displayed based upon the location of the reader.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Tunesly to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure Tunesly settings in WordPress Settings option
  4. Configure iTunes Affiliate Default options
  5. Configure Linkshare Affiliate Configuration
  6. Configure IPInfoDB Configuration
